metadata.title: Sygnal Attributes v5 - Complete Documentation Index
metadata.description: Comprehensive knowledge base for SA5 - Sygnal's Webflow Utilities Library
metadata.tagline: Webflow Tools that Make Your Site Better

overview.description: SA5 is the latest version of Sygnal's Webflow Utilities Library. The tools are organized into individual libraries that extend Webflow's capabilities with advanced features for HTML manipulation, user accounts, forms, layouts, modals, and much more.

navigation_guide.tip: üîç About this Library - gives overview of capabilities
üöÄ Quick Start - provides library code you need
Features are grouped separately within each library

library.name: SA5 HTML
library.purpose: A huge range of page-modification capabilities

key_features.feature: Hide Sections w/ Empty Collection Lists

library.name: SA5 User Accounts
library.purpose: Get logged in user info to personalize your site and improve user experience. Custom-route on login.

library.name: SA5 Rich Text
library.purpose: Add capabilities to Webflow's Rich Text Block

library.name: SA5 Layout
library.purpose: Advanced, dynamic layouts for your Webflow pages

key_features.feature: Restructure your collection lists entirely into groups
Create dynamic tabs from the CMS

library.name: SA5 Forms
library.purpose: Easily replace Webflow's native form handler with your choice of 3rd party handlers like Basin, Zapier, Make, and n8n.

library.name: SA5 Modals
library.purpose: Create powerful, consistent modals with full design control and zero interactions

library.name: SA5 Hotkeys
library.purpose: Define custom hotkeys to trigger your scripts, page actions and navigation

library.name: SA5 URL
library.purpose: Special URL enhancement tools

key_features.feature: Pass-through your query params from one page to another for referer tracking
Target all external links to a new tab

library.name: SA5 Video
library.purpose: Add capabilities to your video elements

library.name: SA5 Elements
library.purpose: Control Webflow's elements with code, and receive events when they change

library.name: SA5 Format
library.purpose: Format numbers and currencies & dates specially

library.name: SA5 Track
library.purpose: Special tracking using cookies and webStorage

library.name: SA5 Select Custom
library.purpose: Custom Select element based on Finsweet's attribute of the same name. Adds some dynamic update capabilities

library.name: SA5 Core
library.purpose: Central to SA5, but has a few tricks up its sleeve

key_features.feature: Hide objects in the designer and make them visible in the published site

library.name: SA5 Cache
library.purpose: Handle high-latency tasks such as content-fetching with a built-in caching layer.

key_features.feature: Allows complex calculations and slow data retrievals to easily cache.
Code your update directly to the cache layer and it will "lazy load" the content when needed.

library.name: SA5 Embeds
library.purpose: Embed external content into your blog posts and pages.

library.name: SA5 Social Share
library.purpose: Adds Email as a social share option. Designed to work in conjunction with Finsweet's Social Share component.

library.name: SA5 Analytics
library.purpose: Adds some analytics capabilities to your site using attributes.

library.name: SA5 Data
library.purpose: Extract CMS data into JS objects from your collection lists, to power your custom code and calculations.

key_features.feature: Extract data from collection lists into datasources
Extract querystring data, and URL data
Data-bind these pieces of information to text elements and form inputs

library.name: SA5 404
library.purpose: Improve your 404 pages

key_features.feature: Smart search trigger Webflow site search based on the Path the user was looking for

library.name: SA5 Countup
library.purpose: Animated count up to a set value. Triggers on scroll-into-view

library.name: SA5 UI
library.purpose: Special UI components

library.name: SA5 Demo
library.purpose: Add special capabilities to your Webflow demo sites, such as links to the correct readonly link page.

library.name: SA5 Commerce
library.purpose: Simple commerce solutions for one-off purchases.

library.name: SA5 Trigger
library.purpose: Custom trigger items and interactions from text links and buttons.

key_features.feature: Trigger interactions, such as pop-ups and modals from a link

library.name: SA5 Calc
library.purpose: Calculate & sum items

library.name: SA5 SEO
library.purpose: Some SEO tools

library.name: SA5 Fixup
library.purpose: Fix a few things in Webflow editor and published sites.

library.name: SA5 Logic
library.purpose: Add logic capabilities using attributes, for conditional visibility and page structuring

library.name: SA5 Effects
library.purpose: Experimental effects

library.name: SA5 State
library.purpose: State management

library.name: SA5 Booking
library.purpose: Tag trigger elements easily to invoke 3rd party booking systems with the correct service, location, category, and staff member.

library.name: SA5 Localization
library.purpose: Various localization features

library.name: SA5 Detect
library.purpose: Detect and manipulate your page depending on how

library.name: SA5 Table
library.purpose: Add HTML tables

v5_tech_stack.change: Changed from JavaScript ES6 codebase to TypeScript
Changed fully from CSS to SASS
Eliminated all use of jQuery in the libraries
Separated classes through the library into discrete source files
Bundled the distributed files differently for even greater efficiency

migration_notes.script_location: Move from before-/body section to before-/head section
migration_notes.library_urls: Change to point at /dist/ path rather than /src/ path type=module is dropped Continue to point to /dist/css/ No changes to custom attributes or existing features needed
